body.p: The Text mode editor in is designed to be a simple, yet powerful, XML source editor. It provides support to help you edit, transform, and debug XML-based documents. It is similar to other common text editors, but also includes specialized editing actions, a powerful Content Completion Assistant, and many other unique features.
To switch to this mode, select Text at the bottom of the editing area.
